description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 01 March 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply, delivery and installation of 14 fully functional non stackable commercial washers and 20 fully functional stackable commercial front load natural gas dryers.
full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

* **Title:** W0113-23CS32 Washers and Dryers Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Reference Number:** WS4424907709-Doc4424981046
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Publication Date:** February 1, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

## Description of Goods and Services:

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply, delivery, and installation of commercial washers and dryers.

* **Commercial Washers: 14** non-stacked, fully functional units.
* **Commercial Dryers: 20** stacked, fully functional, natural gas front load units.

**Notice Information:**

* **Government Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Saghir Ba Mohammed, Halima (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [halima.saghirbamohammed@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ](mailto:halima.saghirbamohammed@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18683027?extsite=MTg2ODMwMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Tender Details:

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Score, considering Technical Merit and Price
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Language of Tender:** English and French

## Trade Agreements:
This RFP is open to suppliers under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Locations:

* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, ON, Canada

The amended tender closing date and time have been updated. All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Authorized Risks of Bid Declaration:**

Please be aware that all bids submitted after the tender closing time will be considered non-responsive and will not receive further consideration.

**Response Deadline Clarification:**

To correct any misunderstandings, disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be
